subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[split]]; to [[rend]]
# {{†}} to [[talk]] [[nonsense]]
# {{†}} to [[pull]] up; to [[stroke]] upward
# {{†}} to [[gather]] up; to [[collect]]
# {{†}} to [[pick]]; to [[choose]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[take]]; to [[get]]; to [[fetch]]
#: {{zh-x|雞仔 大，攞 去 賣|When the chicken grows big, '''take''' it to market|C|ref={{lang|zh|《{{w|yue:氹氹轉，菊花園|氹氹轉，菊花園}}》}}, traditional children's song}}

subSections.text: {{zh-der|攞錢|攞着數|攞走|攞命|攞嚟衰|攞返|攞彩|攞苦嚟辛|攞嚟搞|攞便宜|唔衰攞嚟衰|攞景|攞綜援|攞正牌|攞人命|攞料|攞牌|問師姑攞梳|拽巷攞街|揎拳攞袖}}
